original_title: The Power Of Music - Darrell's Story
overview: Ben Power interviews his father, Darrell Power of Great Big Sea, and asks what it was like on the road, being away from his family, and how being in one of the most memorable Newfoundland bands shaped his life.
tagline: Darrell Power recollects on his time as the bassist of Great Big Sea and talks about what his plans are for the future.
title: The Power Of Music - Darrell's Story
